The Elder will work with Indigenous offenders to help them understand and develop their traditional Indigenous culture. # Government Tender Announcement
## Non-Competitive Tender Notice
### Details of Tender Opportunity

* **Title:** Elder Services for Indigenous Offenders
* **Reference Number:** 21801-24-0010-CB
* **Solicitation Number:** 21801-24-0010
* **Purchase Category:** SRV
* **Business Classification:** Non-competitive tender notice
* **Publication Date:** March 14, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 30, 2024
* **Estimated Contract Value:** $287,455
* **Contract Duration:** One year, with an option to extend for two additional years
* **Region of Opportunity:** British Columbia
* **Region of Delivery:** British Columbia, Canada

## Tender Description

The Correctional Service of Canada intends to award a non-competitive contract for Elder Services for Indigenous Offenders to a pre-identified supplier. The selected supplier must have the necessary experience and qualifications to provide spiritual and cultural services to Indigenous offenders. The services include:

* Providing counseling and teachings based on traditional Indigenous culture
* Conducting ceremonies and spiritual services
* Assisting Indigenous offenders in their traditional healing journey
* Providing advice and guidance to staff on Indigenous spirituality and cultural practices
* Consulting with a circle of Elders already under contract with CSC

## Period of the Proposed Contract

The proposed contract is for a period of one year, from April 3, 2024, to March 31, 2025, with an option to extend the contract for two additional one-year periods.

## Estimated Cost of the Proposed Contract

The estimated value of the contract, including options, is $287,455.00 (GST/HST extra).

## Name and Address of the Pre-identified Supplier

The pre-identified supplier is Celina Leon, contractor’s place of business.

## Statement of Capabilities

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods, services or construction services described in this notice may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified below on or before the closing date and time of this notice.

## Contact Information

The contact person for this notice is Penny Anderson, Procurement & Contracting Specialist, at 33991 Gladys Avenue, PO Box 4500, Abbotsford BC, Canada V2S 2E8; telephone: (236) 380-0298, facsimile: 604-870-2444, email: [Penny.And
